title: Forklift Operator Training
headline: Learn about the operating mechanism and safety considerations of forklift trucks in this free online course.
description: Many workplaces require forklifts to move heavy objects in an efficient and safe manner. This course will teach you the operating mechanisms of various forklift types, safety considerations for the forklift operator and vehicle inspection procedures. You'll learn how to identify hazards in the workplace, assess the risks associated with them and the necessary safety precautions to minimise accidents in the workplace.
courseDescription:
Forklifts are extensively used in warehouses, construction sites and distribution centres for lifting and moving heavy objects. This course will introduce you to forklift operation. You’ll learn about its importance in the workplace and its key components. You’ll explore different types of forklift trucks and their unique performance features to fit your operational needs in diverse workspaces. All forklifts must be inspected to ensure all components are in good condition. We’ll teach you how to conduct a preliminary visual inspection to locate any possible issues with the vehicle and how to perform a thorough examination after switching on the engine. Having learned that, we’ll show you how to operate and manoeuver forklifts safely in the workplace, how to load a forklift, balance the weight on the forks and move the load safely.

Forklifts are powered by combustion engines or electric batteries. Refuelling a forklift appears to be an easy task, but it can be dangerous if not done properly. You’ll learn about the safety procedures for refuelling forklifts and how to maintain batteries to avoid any unwanted incidents. There are a number of factors that can contribute to forklift accidents including unfavourable working conditions, pedestrians on the job floor and narrow alleys. You’ll explore operational risks and hazards present in the workplace, their types and the dangers posed by them. We’ll demonstrate how to perform a risk assessment to identify hazards and discuss safety measures required to avoid workplace accidents. Also, you’ll study safety rules and regulations related to forklifts and useful safety guidelines to ensure the safety of the operator, pedestrians and equipment.

We designed this course for people who want to become professional forklift operators. This course is useful for workers who need to drive any powered industrial truck or forklift. Also, people working in the health and safety department of an organisation will benefit from this course. There are no prerequisites for joining this course and anyone interested in operating forklifts can join. The safety guidelines and instructions provided in the course are simple and easy to follow in a real work environment. A wide range of industries and businesses use forklifts in their routine operations. Hence, there are numerous job opportunities for people with the right knowledge and skill set related to forklift operations and safety. Join this course now to start building and improving your knowledge and understanding of forklift operations and learn for free!
